name: TankBros
description:
The goal of the game is to destroy other players by shooting at them. In every round whoever kills others gains one point. The winner of the game is the person who collects the largest amount of points.
Controls
music: m to turn on/off

Player 1
move: wasd
shoot: spacebar

Player 2
move: arrow keys
shoot: /

Player 3
move: move the mouse to rotate the player, right click to move it forward and middle click to move it backward
shoot: left click

To make things more interesting, there is a special connection between players on the field. There is a fixed maximum amount of bullets that can be on the field simultaneously.
There is a special help folder that will answer all your questions.

Authors

Programming: Suren and Areg
Design: Areg
Audio support: Mher
